img_above_text:
* **Location: Chapter 6 (Mount Huaguo, Foothills, Verdant Path)**
Now that you have the Skandha of Form, Skandha of Feeling, Skandha of Thought, and Skandha of Choice, you'll need to wait until Chapter 6 and once you acquire the ability to travel on the clouds.
img_below_text:
Fly using the clouds and go from the edge of the cliff, almost directly north of where you came. This will be where you can find the Son of Stones optional boss, with the Son sitting at the edge of the cliff.
![Five Skandhas \(20\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/5d/Five_Skandhas_%2820%29.png)

1. **Summary of the Image**:  
The image depicts the protagonist of *Black Myth: Wukong* standing on a cloud, overlooking a vast mountainous landscape. A red arrow points to a distant cliff, indicating the direction to travel in order to reach the location of the optional boss, "Son of Stones." This scene is part of Chapter 6, where players use cloud traversal to explore the Verdant Path area.

2. **Purpose, Content, or Narrative Role**:  
The image serves as a visual guide to help players locate the optional boss, "Son of Stones," by showing the vantage point and the direction they need to fly using the cloud ability. It ties into the progression of the quest involving the Five Skandhas and exploration in the Mount Huaguo region.
